# Trombinoscope {-}

[EN CONSTRUCTION]

C'est plus sympa de savoir qui est qui, et d'appeler les gens par leur prénom, alors voici la tête de nos licenciés :

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
photos <- list.files("trombi", pattern = "\\.png$", 
                     full.names = TRUE, recursive = FALSE)
bigassertr::assert_dir("docs/trombi")
osef <- file.copy(photos, file.path("docs", photos), overwrite = TRUE)

html_code <- sapply(photos[order(file.info(photos)$mtime)], function(path) {
  
  prenom <- sub("(.+)_(.+)\\.png", "\\1", basename(path))
  nom    <- sub("(.+)_(.+)\\.png", "\\2", basename(path))
  
  paste0(
    "<div style='display:inline-block; width:90px; height:200px; margin:10px; text-align:center; vertical-align:top;'>",
    "<img src='", path, "' style='width:90px; border-radius:8px;'><br>",
    "<div style='height:80px; overflow:hidden; line-height:1.2em;'>",
    "<strong>", tools::toTitleCase(prenom), " ", tools::toTitleCase(nom), "</strong>",
    "</div></div>"
  )
})

cat(paste(html_code, collapse = "\n"))
```
